name: NSSF Contribution
query:
SELECT 
    employee AS "Employee ID",
    employee_name AS "Employee Name",
    gross_pay AS "Gross Earnings",
    ROUND(gross_pay * 0.05, 2) AS "Employee NSSF (5%)",
    ROUND(gross_pay * 0.10, 2) AS "Employer NSSF (10%)",
    ROUND(gross_pay * 0.15, 2) AS "Total NSSF (15%)",
    CONCAT(start_date, ' to ', end_date) AS "Period"
FROM `tabSalary Slip`
WHERE docstatus = 1
ORDER BY employee_name;
